Description: Depth at which ARMS units were deployed
Sea surface chlorophyll A derived from satellite imagery, 200--400 m offshore
Sea surface temparature, measured 200--400 m offshore
Bathymetric slope index, defined as the horizontal distance from shore to the 50 m isobath

Satellite-derived coral coverage. Defined as the number of pixels with more than 10% cover in IKONOS satellite imagery covering the 0--30 m depth range. Expressed as a percentage of the total number of pixels analyzed
Shortest path distance in km between the approximate centroids of the two nearest islands, calculated using Google Earth
Incoming centrality metric calculated from modeled larval connectivity estimated from an oceanographic biophysical model parameterized for the species and habitat array
Dimensionless measure of cumulative human impacts
